item.description: Nexus Repository Contents Nexus Repository Contents What is Nexus repository? Configuration Nexus Repository on Linux (CentOS or Redhat) 1. Install packages Change configuration of Nexus What is Nexus repository? Configuration Nexus Repository on Linux (CentOS or Redhat) 1. Install packages Install Java 1.8 $ sudo yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk.x86_64 Download Nexus package from SonarType $ cd /tmp/ && wget https://sonatype-download.global.ssl.fastly.net/repository/repositoryManager/3/nexus-3.14.0-04-unix.tar.gz Unzip and move to /opt/nexus
